snippet: In this cabaret-theater hybrid at Don’t Tell Mama, a top-flight cast of musicians invokes jazz and blues archetypes of the ’30s and ’40s.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews jazz cabaret show Pompie's Place, featuring singers Lezlie Harrison and Hilary Gardner, at Don't Tell Mama.
lead_paragraph: In this cabaret-theater hybrid at Don’t Tell Mama, a top-flight cast of musicians invokes jazz and blues archetypes of the ’30s and ’40s.

headline.main: Review: ‘Pompie’s Place,’ a Blues Club in a Time Warp
headline.print_headline: Traveling Back in Time to a Haunt of Tarnished Angels
